hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT rownum, EOOL.EOOL_ID, EOOL.CREATOR, EOOL.CREATE_TIME, EOOL.MODIFIER, EOOL.MODIFY_TIME, EOOL.REC_VER, EOOL.REC_STATUS, EOOL.ORG_ID, EOOL.EOOL_ORDER_NO, EOOL.EOOL_LOGISTIC_NO, EOOL.EOOL_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOOL.EOOL_ORDER_TYPE_CODE, EOOL.SITE_CODE, EOOL.SITE_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_SHIPPER_PWH_CODE, EOOL.EOOL_SHIPPER_PWH_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CONTRACT_NO, EOOL.EOOL_SOURCE_CODE, EOOL.EOOL_SOURCE_SYS, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_LOCATION_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_PROVINCE_CODE, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_PROVINCE_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_CITY_CODE, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_CITY_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_CODE, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_DISTRICT_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_PHONE, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_CONTACT_MOBILE, EOOL.EOOL_REQUIRE_CONSIGNEE_TIME, EOOL.EOOL_CONSIGNEE_NAME, EOOL.EOOL_BUSINESS_TYPE, EOOL.EOOL_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOOL.EOOL_QUANTITY, EOOL.EOOL_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOOL.EOOL_VOLUME, EOOL.EOOL_ISSUED_FLAG, EOOL.EOOL_AFFIRM_DATE, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR1, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR2, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR3, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR4, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR5, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR6, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR7, EOOL.EOOL_SUBSTR8, EOOL.EOOL_SUBDATE1, EOOL.EOOL_SUBDATE2, EOOL.EOOL_SUBDATE3, EOOL.EOOL_SUBDATE4, EOOL.EOOL_SUBDATE5, EOOL.EOOL_SUBNUM1, EOOL.EOOL_SUBNUM2, EOOL.EOOL_SUBNUM3, EOOL.EOOL_ORDER_GENERATE_DATE, EOOL.EOOL_FAILURE_REASON FROM EO_ORDER_LOTS EOOL WHERE 1 = 1 << AND EOOL.EOOL_ISSUED_FLAG LIKE :eoolIssuedFlag >> << AND EOOL.EOOL_ORDER_NO IN (:eoolOrderNos)>> <#if limitRowNum == 'Y'> AND rownum<=:rowNumSize </#if> <#if resendTimes == 'Y'> AND (EOOL.EOOL_SUBNUM2 IS NULL OR EOOL.EOOL_SUBNUM2<20) </#if>
